guest.name: Sanchan Saxena
guest.title: VP of Product, Coinbase
guest.background: Former Head of Product at Airbnb and Head of Product for Instagram Ads & Shopping. He has a track record of leading products through hypergrowth and crisis at major tech companies.
guest.background_zh: 现任 Coinbase 产品副总裁，曾任 Airbnb 产品负责人及 Instagram 广告与电商业务产品主管。他在顶级科技公司拥有丰富的产品领导经验，擅长带领团队应对超高速增长与重大危机。

episodeSummary: Sanchan Saxena shares deep insights from his time at Airbnb, Instagram, and Coinbase, focusing on crisis management, product strategy, and hiring. He details how Airbnb survived the COVID crash through belief-building and 2-week cycles, explains the difference between 'content' and 'process' in hiring, and discusses Coinbase's unique decision-making culture.
episodeSummary_zh: Sanchan Saxena 分享了他在 Airbnb、Instagram 和 Coinbase 的深度洞察，重点涵盖危机管理、产品策略和招聘方法论。他详细讲述了 Airbnb 如何通过重塑信念和“两周冲刺”周期挺过疫情危机，解析了招聘中“业务本质（Content）”与“流程（Process）”的区别，并探讨了 Coinbase 独特的决策文化。
